verses.verse: And the children <S%H1121><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%> again <S%H3254><s%> <S%H8686><s%> did <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8800><s%> evil <S%H7451><s%> in the sight <S%H5869><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%>, when Ehud <S%H164><s%> was dead <S%H4191><s%> <S%H8804><s%>.

And the YY <S%H3068><s%> sold <S%H4376><s%> <S%H8799><s%> them into the hand <S%H3027><s%> of Jabin <S%H2985><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Kanahan <S%H3667><s%>, that reigned <S%H4427><s%> <S%H8804><s%> in Hazor <S%H2674><s%>; the captain <S%H8269><s%> of whose host <S%H6635><s%> was Sisra <S%H5516><s%>, which dwelt <S%H3427><s%> <S%H8802><s%> in Harosheth <S%H2800><s%> of the goyim <S%H1471><s%>.

And the children <S%H1121><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%> cried <S%H6817><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto the YY <S%H3068><s%>: for he had nine <S%H8672><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> chariots <S%H7393><s%> of iron <S%H1270><s%>; and twenty <S%H6242><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> he mightily <S%H2394><s%> oppressed <S%H3905><s%> <S%H8804><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%>.
And D'vorah <S%H1683><s%>, a prophetess <S%H5031><s%>, the wife <S%H802><s%> of Lapidoth <S%H3941><s%>, she judged <S%H8199><s%> <S%H8802><s%> Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%> at that time <S%H6256><s%>.

And she dwelt <S%H3427><s%> <S%H8802><s%> under the palm tree <S%H8560><s%> of D'vorah <S%H1683><s%> between Ramah <S%H7414><s%> and Beit-El <S%H1008><s%> in mount <S%H2022><s%> Efrayim <S%H669><s%>: and the children <S%H1121><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%> came up <S%H5927><s%> <S%H8799><s%> to her for judgment <S%H4941><s%>.

And she sent <S%H7971><s%> <S%H8799><s%> and called <S%H7121><s%> <S%H8799><s%> Barak <S%H1301><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Abinoam <S%H42><s%> out of Kedeshnaphtali <S%H6943><s%>, and said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto him, Hath not the YY <S%H3068><s%> 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> <S%H8765><s%>, saying, Go <S%H3212><s%> <S%H8798><s%> and draw <S%H4900><s%> <S%H8804><s%> toward mount <S%H2022><s%> Tavor <S%H8396><s%>, and take <S%H3947><s%> <S%H8804><s%> with thee ten <S%H6235><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> men <S%H376><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Naftali <S%H5321><s%> and of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Z'vulun <S%H2074><s%> ?

And I will draw <S%H4900><s%> <S%H8804><s%> unto thee to the river <S%H5158><s%> Kishon <S%H7028><s%> Sisra <S%H5516><s%>, the captain <S%H8269><s%> of Jabin's <S%H2985><s%> army <S%H6635><s%>, with his chariots <S%H7393><s%> and his multitude <S%H1995><s%>; and I will deliver <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8804><s%> him into thine hand <S%H3027><s%>.

And Barak <S%H1301><s%> said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto her, If thou wilt go <S%H3212><s%> <S%H8799><s%> with me, then I will go <S%H1980><s%> <S%H8804><s%>: but if thou wilt not go <S%H3212><s%> <S%H8799><s%> with me, then I will not go <S%H3212><s%> <S%H8799><s%>.

And she said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, I will surely <S%H1980><s%> <S%H8800><s%> go <S%H3212><s%> <S%H8799><s%> with thee: notwithstanding <S%H657><s%> the journey <S%H1870><s%> that thou takest <S%H1980><s%> <S%H8802><s%> shall not be for thine honour <S%H8597><s%>; for the YY <S%H3068><s%> shall sell <S%H4376><s%> <S%H8799><s%> Sisra <S%H5516><s%> into the hand <S%H3027><s%> of a woman <S%H802><s%>. And D'vorah <S%H1683><s%> arose <S%H6965><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, and went <S%H3212><s%> <S%H8799><s%> with Barak <S%H1301><s%> to Kedesh <S%H6943><s%>.

And Barak <S%H1301><s%> called <S%H2199><s%> <S%H8686><s%> Z'vulun <S%H2074><s%> and Naftali <S%H5321><s%> to Kedesh <S%H6943><s%>; and he went up <S%H5927><s%> <S%H8799><s%> with ten <S%H6235><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> men <S%H376><s%> at his feet <S%H7272><s%>: and D'vorah <S%H1683><s%> went up <S%H5927><s%> <S%H8799><s%> with him.

Now Heber <S%H2268><s%> the Kenite <S%H7017><s%>, which was of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Hobab <S%H2246><s%> the father in Torah <S%H2859><s%> <S%H8802><s%> of Mosheh <S%H4872><s%>, had severed <S%H6504><s%> <S%H8737><s%> himself from the Kenites <S%H7017><s%>, and pitched <S%H5186><s%> <S%H8799><s%> his tent <S%H168><s%> unto the plain <S%H436><s%> of Zaanaim <S%H6815><s%>, which is by Kedesh <S%H6943><s%>.

And they shewed <S%H5046><s%> <S%H8686><s%> Sisra <S%H5516><s%> that Barak <S%H1301><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Abinoam <S%H42><s%> was gone up <S%H5927><s%> <S%H8804><s%> to mount <S%H2022><s%> Tavor <S%H8396><s%>.

And Sisra <S%H5516><s%> gathered together <S%H2199><s%> <S%H8686><s%> all his chariots <S%H7393><s%>, even nine <S%H8672><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> chariots <S%H7393><s%> of iron <S%H1270><s%>, and all the people <S%H5971><s%> that were with him, from Harosheth <S%H2800><s%> of the goyim <S%H1471><s%> unto the river <S%H5158><s%> of Kishon <S%H7028><s%>.

And D'vorah <S%H1683><s%> said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto Barak <S%H1301><s%>, Up <S%H6965><s%> <S%H8798><s%>; for this is the day <S%H3117><s%> in which the YY <S%H3068><s%> hath delivered <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8804><s%> Sisra <S%H5516><s%> into thine hand <S%H3027><s%>: is not the YY <S%H3068><s%> gone out <S%H3318><s%> <S%H8804><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> thee? So Barak <S%H1301><s%> went down <S%H3381><s%> <S%H8799><s%> from mount <S%H2022><s%> Tavor <S%H8396><s%>, and ten <S%H6235><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> men <S%H376><s%> after <S%H310><s%> him.

And the YY <S%H3068><s%> discomfited <S%H2000><s%> <S%H8799><s%> Sisra <S%H5516><s%>, and all his chariots <S%H7393><s%>, and all his host <S%H4264><s%>, with the edge <S%H6310><s%> of the sword <S%H2719><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> Barak <S%H1301><s%>; so that Sisra <S%H5516><s%> lighted down <S%H3381><s%> <S%H8799><s%> off his chariot <S%H4818><s%>, and fled away <S%H5127><s%> <S%H8799><s%> on his feet <S%H7272><s%>.

But Barak <S%H1301><s%> pursued <S%H7291><s%> <S%H8804><s%> after <S%H310><s%> the chariots <S%H7393><s%>, and after the host <S%H4264><s%>, unto Harosheth <S%H2800><s%> of the goyim <S%H1471><s%>: and all the host <S%H4264><s%> of Sisra <S%H5516><s%> fell <S%H5307><s%> <S%H8799><s%> upon the edge <S%H6310><s%> of the sword <S%H2719><s%>; and there was not a man <S%H259><s%> left <S%H7604><s%> <S%H8738><s%>.

Howbeit Sisra <S%H5516><s%> fled away <S%H5127><s%> <S%H8804><s%> on his feet <S%H7272><s%> to the tent <S%H168><s%> of Jael <S%H3278><s%> the wife <S%H802><s%> of Heber <S%H2268><s%> the Kenite <S%H7017><s%>: for there was peace <S%H7965><s%> between Jabin <S%H2985><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%> of Hazor <S%H2674><s%> and the house <S%H1004><s%> of Heber <S%H2268><s%> the Kenite <S%H7017><s%>.

And Jael <S%H3278><s%> went out <S%H3318><s%> <S%H8799><s%> to meet <S%H7125><s%> <S%H8800><s%> Sisra <S%H5516><s%>, and said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto him, Turn in <S%H5493><s%> <S%H8798><s%>, my lord <S%H113><s%>, turn in <S%H5493><s%> <S%H8798><s%> to me; fear <S%H3372><s%> <S%H8799><s%> not. And when he had turned in <S%H5493><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto her into the tent <S%H168><s%>, she covered <S%H3680><s%> <S%H8762><s%> him with a mantle <S%H8063><s%>.

And he said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto her, Give me, I pray thee, a little <S%H4592><s%> water <S%H4325><s%> to drink <S%H8248><s%> <S%H8685><s%>; for I am thirsty <S%H6770><s%> <S%H8804><s%>. And she opened <S%H6605><s%> <S%H8799><s%> a bottle <S%H4997><s%> of milk <S%H2461><s%>, and gave him drink <S%H8248><s%> <S%H8686><s%>, and covered <S%H3680><s%> <S%H8762><s%> him.

Again he said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto her, Stand in <S%H5975><s%> <S%H8798><s%> the door <S%H6607><s%> of the tent <S%H168><s%>, and it shall be, when any man <S%H376><s%> doth come <S%H935><s%> <S%H8799><s%> and enquire <S%H7592><s%> <S%H8804><s%> of thee, and say <S%H559><s%> <S%H8804><s%>, Is there <S%H3426><s%> any man <S%H376><s%> here <S%H3426><s%>? that thou shalt say <S%H559><s%> <S%H8804><s%>, No.

Then Jael <S%H3278><s%> Heber's <S%H2268><s%> wife <S%H802><s%> took <S%H3947><s%> <S%H8799><s%> a nail <S%H3489><s%> of the tent <S%H168><s%>, and took <S%H7760><s%> <S%H8799><s%> an hammer <S%H4718><s%> in her hand <S%H3027><s%>, and went <S%H935><s%> <S%H8799><s%> softly <S%H3814><s%> unto him, and smote <S%H8628><s%> <S%H8799><s%> the nail <S%H3489><s%> into his temples <S%H7541><s%>, and fastened <S%H6795><s%> <S%H8799><s%> it into the ground <S%H776><s%>: for he was fast asleep <S%H7290><s%> <S%H8738><s%> and weary <S%H5774><s%> <S%H8799><s%>. So he died <S%H4191><s%> <S%H8799><s%>.

And, behold, as Barak <S%H1301><s%> pursued <S%H7291><s%> <S%H8802><s%> Sisra <S%H5516><s%>, Jael <S%H3278><s%> came out <S%H3318><s%> <S%H8799><s%> to meet <S%H7125><s%> <S%H8800><s%> him, and said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto him, Come <S%H3212><s%> <S%H8798><s%>, and I will shew <S%H7200><s%> <S%H8686><s%> thee the man <S%H376><s%> whom thou seekest <S%H1245><s%> <S%H8764><s%>. And when he came <S%H935><s%> <S%H8799><s%> into her tent, behold, Sisra <S%H5516><s%> lay <S%H5307><s%> <S%H8802><s%> dead <S%H4191><s%> <S%H8801><s%>, and the nail <S%H3489><s%> was in his temples <S%H7541><s%>.

So 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> subdued <S%H3665><s%> <S%H8686><s%> on that day <S%H3117><s%> Jabin <S%H2985><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%> of Kanahan <S%H3667><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%>.

And the hand <S%H3027><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%> prospered <S%H3212><s%> <S%H8799><s%> <S%H1980><s%> <S%H8800><s%>, and prevailed <S%H7186><s%> against Jabin <S%H2985><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%> of Kanahan <S%H3667><s%>, until they had destroyed <S%H3772><s%> <S%H8689><s%> Jabin <S%H2985><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Kanahan <S%H3667><s%>.
